import React, { useContext } from 'react' import styles from "./Pacientes.module.css" import contexto from '../../context/Contexto' import { DataExcel } from '../../context/DataExcel' function Pacientes({ preg }) { const { pregunta } = useContext(contexto); const { dataExcel } = useContext(DataExcel); const selectOption = (e) => { console.log(e.target.name) console.log(e.target.id) const agregarID = dataExcel.findIndex((data) => data.id === e.target.id) console.log(agregarID) if(agregarID === -1){ pregunta.findIndex((data) => data.id === e.target.id ) console.log(data) } } return (

{preg.id}. {preg.pregunta}

) } export default Pacientes
